name: Saxx Quest Boxers (2 Pack) - Men's
description: Highly breathable and chafe-free, these boxers are made of a nylon, spandex and polyester blend that provides firm support. An articulated front pouch and internal mesh panels combine to give you room and prevent unwanted friction.Antimicrobial treatment controls odour.Flatlock seams and an operable fly.9-panel construction, because 8-panel is so yesterday.Seamless on the inside front to prevent irritation and reduce chafing.Parallel side panels offer a barrier between one's package and inner thigh.Wide, no-fold waistband wicks and stays dry.5in. inseam.Sold as a package of 2.
